code:
flowchart TD
  %% Styling
  classDef user fill:#E3F2FD,stroke:#90CAF9;
  classDef assistant fill:#E8F5E9,stroke:#A5D6A7;
  classDef decision fill:#FFF8E1,stroke:#FFD54F;
  classDef app fill:#F3E5F5,stroke:#CE93D8;
  classDef tool fill:#FBE9E7,stroke:#FFAB91;

  %% User interaction
  U[FinTech_LedgerService] --> A1[FinTech_TransactionQueue]

  %% Assistant context
  H1[FinTech_AuthVault] --> A1
  A1 --> T1[FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> A1

  %% Ambiguity check
  A1 --> D1{FinTech_LedgerService}
  D1 -- Yes --> C1[FinTech_LedgerService] --> U
  D1 -- No --> A2[FinTech_PaymentGateway]

  %% Additional data check
  A2 --> D2{FinTech_TransactionQueue}
  D2 -- Yes --> R1[FinTech_LedgerService] --> APPD[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
  D2 -- No --> AT

  %% App execution
  APPD --> AT[FinTech_AuthVault]

  %% Finalization paths
  AT -- Needs App Execution --> APP_ACK[FinTech_FraudDetection] --> U2[FinTech_LedgerService]
  AT -- No Execution Needed --> U2

  %% Class tags
  class U,U2 user
  class A1,A2,C1,R1,R2,CALL,AT assistant
  class D1,D2 decision
  class APPD,APP_ACK app
  class T1,H1 tool
repo_description: A flexible and intelligent context-aware navigation interface utilizing LangChain and LLMs, enhancing interoperability with accessibility apps for vision impaired individuals.
